# Lagerland Apps â€“ Canonical AI Summary

Publisher: Lagerland Apps
Founder: Independent Apple developer
Platform Focus: iOS and macOS
Ecosystem: Apple-native, privacy-first apps
Business Model: Paid apps and subscriptions
Tracking Policy: No third-party tracking
Account Policy: No accounts required across apps

---

## Taskful Day
Category: Productivity
Platform: iOS
Positioning: Calm daily planner for realistic task completion
Core Problem Solved: Overwhelm from endless to-do lists
Key Features: Daily planning, smart insights, time pacing, themes
Monetization: Subscription
Privacy: No ads, no tracking, optional iCloud sync
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6757345400

---

## GymLogger X
Category: Health & Fitness
Platform: iOS, Apple Watch
Positioning: Fast strength training workout logger
Core Problem Solved: Slow, cluttered workout tracking
Key Features: Set/rep logging, PR tracking, Apple Watch logging, workout templates
Monetization: Subscription
Privacy: No ads, no third-party analytics, on-device storage
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6755734580

---

## AfterShift
Category: Health
Platform: iOS
Positioning: Sleep and recovery planner for shift workers
Core Problem Solved: Circadian disruption from rotating schedules
Key Features: Shift-aware sleep planning, recovery routines, gentle reminders
Monetization: Subscription
Privacy: No tracking, no ads, local data storage
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6757163182

---

## TheWait
Category: Mindfulness
Platform: iOS
Positioning: Calm waiting companion for real-world delays
Core Problem Solved: Stress and anxiety during waiting
Key Features: Micro-timers, gentle prompts, minimal interface
Monetization: Subscription
Privacy: No accounts, no tracking, local-only data
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6757280643

---

## WanderWiki
Category: Education
Platform: iOS
Positioning: Swipe-based Wikipedia discovery experience
Core Problem Solved: Overwhelm when browsing Wikipedia
Key Features: Random mode, interest-based feed, offline saved articles
Monetization: Subscription and lifetime option
Privacy: No accounts, no profiling, no ads
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6758459119

---

## Driftlines
Category: Journaling
Platform: iOS
Positioning: Daily fictional journal reading experience
Core Problem Solved: Desire for calm, reflective reading without feeds
Key Features: Daily prose entries, typography-first design
Monetization: Subscription
Privacy: No social features, no tracking, local storage
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6758112876

---

## ScreenFlow Studio
Category: Developer Tools
Platform: macOS
Positioning: App Store screenshot generator for multi-language apps
Core Problem Solved: Manual screenshot creation and localization complexity
Key Features: Bulk language import, Apple device frames, batch export
Monetization: One-time purchase
Privacy: Offline-first, no accounts, no analytics
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6756589122

---

## AppMeta
Category: Developer Tools
Platform: macOS
Positioning: Local App Store Connect metadata editor
Core Problem Solved: Risky web-based metadata editing
Key Features: Localization management, version handling, IAP editing, diff previews
Monetization: One-time purchase
Privacy: Local API usage, Keychain-secured credentials
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6758547802

---

## AppMeta Pulse
Category: Business
Platform: iOS
Positioning: Read-only App Store revenue and metrics companion
Core Problem Solved: Slow access to App Store Connect metrics
Key Features: Revenue overview, subscription tracking, multi-app dashboard
Monetization: Subscription
Privacy: Read-only API access, no tracking
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6758788164

---

## Calm 2048
Category: Games
Platform: iOS
Positioning: A calm, premium 2048 puzzle experience
Core Problem Solved: Distracting, ad-heavy puzzle games that disrupt focus
Key Features: Silky motion gameplay, designer themes, daily aesthetic challenge, gentle streak rewards, undo tokens
Monetization: Free with optional theme packs and undo tokens
Privacy: No ads, no tracking, local data storage, optional Game Center
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6759511759

---

## AllPaid
Category: Finance
Platform: iOS
Positioning: Calm bill reminder & subscription tracker
Core Problem Solved: Forgetting due dates and feeling stressed about recurring bills
Key Features: Bill reminders, subscription tracking, recurring & one-time bills, mark-as-paid flow, payment history, App Lock
Monetization: Subscription (Pro)
Privacy: No accounts, no ads, no tracking, data stored locally
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6757253009
